Name: Asam Pedas
Description: A dish with a distinctive sour and spicy flavor. Prepared with fish, tomatoes, and seasonings.

DescriptionLocalization.ko: 신맛과 매운맛이 특징인 요리. 생선, 토마토, 양념을 곁들여 준비했습니다.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Un plat à la saveur acide et relevée distinctive. Préparé avec du poisson, des tomates et des épices.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 酸味と辛さの利いた美味しい料理。材料は魚とトマトと調味料。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Um prato com um sabor azedo e picante distinto. Preparado com peixes, tomates e temperos.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Блюдо с характерным кисло - пряным вкусом. Готовится с рыбой, помидорами и приправами
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Ayırt edici acılı ve ekşi bir tadı var. Balık, domates ve baharatlarla hazırlanır.
